website_summaries.verdict: On and off the court, the NEO Cloudfoam Thunder Mid performs in style. Majority of the users who have used these sneakers for basketball and everyday purposes did not encounter problems. In fact, this 80s basketball-inspired sneaker vows excellent support with its mid-top silhouette and superior comfort with its Cloudfoam technology.  The affordable price tag attached to these sneakers make it well-worth the purchase.
pros: Several reviewers positively note that these sneakers provide excellent traction and grip on and off the basketball court
Majority of the users gave favorable comments about the Adidas Cloudfoam Thunder Mid’s comfort
One user appreciates the 80s timeless design of these sneakers
As a mass-produced product, these sneakers are well-made
The Adidas Cloudfoam Thunder Mid can be availed at an affordable price
Despite the synthetic leather upper, these sneakers are breathable according to one tester
Several users did not encounter problems upon using these shoes for basketball or for walking all day
The Cloudfoam technology gains positive reviews from some users because it provides additional padding and enhances the comfort of the shoe
Several users love that these sneakers offer great support which is helpful when playing ball
cons: A significant number of consumers dropped negative feedbacks on the loud squeaking sound the shoe makes on every step
The synthetic leather upper of the shoe does not generate a premium appeal on its overall look
The plump silhouette of the Cloudfoam Thunder Mid doesn’t appeal one user

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair. That statement should be sufficient enough for this review.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a comfortable "high-top" basketball shoe for several years. I have ordered several on line only to return them due improper fit or lack of quality workmanship. I finally hit the jackpot with these Adidas! Very comfortable, well made, and will probably last for years. I will definitely order more of these if/when they are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Av8tor44

customer_reviews.title: 💯%Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. Nice and comfortable sneaker. Fits as expected (choose your normal size as I did "11"). Overall good. Images attached
customer_reviews.author: Adamsy

customer_reviews.title: He said almost 2 months after receiving them that he still feels like he is walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas! He said almost 2 months after receiving them that he still feels like he is walking on clouds. They fit exactly as sized and the colors are great! I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: David Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $39
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, they made some noise when I walked but a little powder took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: JoeEGT

customer_reviews.title: Loud but flossy haha
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Only problem is, is that they squeak really loud every time I take a step. Tried trouble shooting it and it won't go away lol
customer_reviews.author: AmazonianAddict

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks after a while
customer_reviews.text: Light, good looking, good fitting. Perfect. For an hour. Then, my left shoe develops a noticeable squeak. Not sure if it's an issue with larger shoes (US14) or what, but my last pair of adidas squeaked, too.
customer_reviews.author: Scheib

customer_reviews.title: Nice look but poor quality..
customer_reviews.text: I love the style. I love Adidas BUT mind you one shoe started falling apart. I've had since June 1st and now it's July 2nd...one month..kind of disappointed although I could get shoe glue, I don't think I should have to go that route. I wouldn't be surprised if some And1 Walmart shoes but these are Adidas.. They shouldn't fall apart in one month when I Rarely wear them :/
customer_reviews.author: OldGreg

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. My first thought is cheap Chinese knock-off. One shoes insole is too small its extremely uncomfortable as the insole edges dig into my foot. Now 1 1/2 months in they are already falling apart. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I like them
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like them. Some other models were squeaking after a while of usage so I have to see if it happens with this model as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karel G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The leather is not genuine so it makes the shoe look fake
customer_reviews.author: Indiajo

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of Adidas gym shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Adidas mens cloudfoam basketball gym shoes. It fits good. It was exactly as pictured. And i got it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jane 😁

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love them, but they are not as comfortable as my other two pairs of cloudfoam I have bought. Also the hitops around my ankles hurt my ankle sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sneakers. The size fit as expected, they are comfortable and look good. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great looking comfortable shoes for a decent price i havent ...
customer_reviews.text: If u wear 8.5 in nike buy 8s in this shoe. These are great looking comfortable shoes for a decent price i havent played on wood floors yet but these stop great outside. These and my work cloud foam basketball shows are the comfiest shoes i have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, this is my second pair. Aggressive tread, comfy sole, good ankle support. Sport these on and off the court.
customer_reviews.author: bmx4life

customer_reviews.title: comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: looks & feels like other sneakers. i will update this review if sneakers do not wear well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes squeak very loud. thought it just needed ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes squeak very loud. thought it just needed to be broken in but time did not help much.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Lasted
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted a 12 year old boy almost a year!
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: I like them but they fell apart way to fast
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they fell apart way to fast. Bought them to use for a college basketball team and they bottom came apart within a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fregoso

customer_reviews.title: The Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable.... I get complement on them too double yes!!
customer_reviews.author: TKV

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great..... Packaging not so much
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for any activity where you are on your feet for long periods of time due to the cloud foam technology. I love them at first I used them for the gym but now use them for work since I work at a warehouse and on my feet all day. Taking one star away due to packaging. The shoes came in your standard green adidas NEO box. But the box was in a regular mailing bag which tore in transit resulting in the box being damaged. Luckily the shoes are fine and are AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The shoes look nice and they are comfortable Cons: The quality is not good at all! I just used them twice in a indoor basketball gym, and they are already broken (with a hole)
customer_reviews.author: Matias F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them and says they are the comfiest shoes he's ever bought !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Adidas Men's Cloudfoam Thunder Mid Ankle-High Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Cloudfoam Thunder Mid by Adidas is built with a perfect blend of style durability and comfort Robust combines with a heavy-duty rubber sole to ensure a long lifespan for your favorite everyday-wear shoes An ergonomic design and low base contribute to the undeniable coziness without compromising its trendy appearance It also features a cloudfoam footbed to help you wear these all day long The Cloudfoam Thunder Mid by Adidas is the ultimate casual shoe that will be a mainstay in your closet
feature_bullets: Matte-finished synthetic leather upper is soft and durable
Debossed and printed 3-stripes; soft textile lining for comfort
Cloud foam sock liner for comfort and lightweight cushioning
Cloud foam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
Rubber cup sole provides excellent traction
